data.title: Maya The Bee
data.text:
CHARACTERS

MAYA

Maya isn’t like other bees, she is fun and fearless with a big personality! Maya dreams of an exciting life of discovery, adventure and freedom in the mysterious meadow, away from the endless rules of the hive.

WILLY

Maya’s best friend is Willi, a shy little bee who loves the excitement that Maya brings to his quiet life.

FLIP

All of the bugs in the meadow look up to Flip, a cool grasshopper that loves music and lives life by his own rules. As soon as they meet, Maya decides that she wants to live that way too.

MISS CASSANDRA

Miss Casandra is every baby bee’s favourite teacher and she loves them all – none more than her newest pupil Maya, who shows her charming teacher that not all rules are meant to be followed.

THE QUEEN

Charming, kind and wise, the hive’s Queen Bee sees something in Maya that most other bees don’t; she understands that Maya is a unique and very special bee.

STING

Sting is a tough and brave little hornet who believes everything his Dad tells him, especially that bees are his natural enemy. But after he meets Maya the little warrior realises that things can be different…

BUZZLINA

Buzzlina Von Beena is the Queen’s Royal Advisor and the most powerful bee in the hive - she makes the rules and makes sure that everyone obeys them. Buzzlina sees Maya as a fearless troublemaker, one small bee standing in the way of her evil plans…

CRAWLEY

Crawley is the nervous servant of Buzzlina, a bumbling and loyal bee who secretly doesn’t agree with her, but isn’t brave enough to do anything except carry out her orders.

HANK

Hank is the ferocious leader of the hornets, the biggest bee-hater of all, and Sting’s Dad. However, underneath his tough exterior, all that Hank really wants is what’s best for his fellow hornets, especially his son.

ARNIE & BARNEY

Arnie & Barney are a hopeless pair of army ants. The worst in their troop, they are always causing accidents, and when they are sent in search of Maya and Willi they end up having a very silly adventure of their own!
